helpTextAfterGenerators:
Current Generators:
   - hex, Lowercase Hexadecimal
   - HEX, Uppercase Hexadecimal
   - alphanumeric, Uppercase letters and numbers without look-alikes
   - lower, Lowercase letters and numbers without look-alikes
   - insensitive, All letters and numbers without look-alikes
   - base36, All letters and numbers with look-alikes
   - digits, Just numbers
   - uuidv4
   - sha256, Randomly generated sha values
   - name, Full names
   - firstname, Just first names
   - lastname, Only Last names
   - custom, Generate with given input (use --language)
   - fmt, Pure Generator (see fmt section)
   - unicode
   - symbols
helpTextAfterFmt:
Fmt Generator:
The format generator will take a string within option --format.

Use any of the named generators below in a string. Only matching gererators
will be replaced.

Example: 'name() likes the color #lang.hex(6)' can generate the string
         'John Doe likes the color #A1B2C3'

List of Format Generators:
- lang(length)
   .hex
   .lhex
   .numeric
   .clean
   .insensitive
   .lower
   .alphanumeric
   .custom(length, language)
- name()
   .full
   .first
   .last
- int(min, max, pad)
- float(min, max, prec)
- sha(sourceValue)
- rsha()
- uuid()
- choose(options)
- count(starting)
